p: Three 12-month-old WT (C57BL/6J) mice or mutant mice with chow diet were selected for the present study. The tail blood of each mouse was taken and 1/10 volume of sodium citrate anticoagulant was added. After centrifuging for 10 min, the upper plasma was used to perform the lipidomic profiling. Overall, more than 20 classes of lipids including CEs, GluCer, LPE, Cho, PE, TAGs, DAGs, Cer, LPS, PA, and PI were detected ( Table 1).
